ygData.subject: Re: L50 (Spoilers)
ygData.msgSnippet: Since you are a bard I hope you can answer this question for me.  What level did you see an improvement in damage, (when did you start doing more than
ygData.messageBody:
Since you are a bard I hope you can answer this question for me. What level
did you see an improvement in damage, (when did you start doing more than
(2xdmg)+1. I have heard so many different stories I don't know who to
believe. I have a strength of 90 base, and 102 with songs. Does the
strength effect the damage, or is based on skill points, or what.

I would appreciate any response you could offer.

Thanks,

Wenaddar


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [SMTP:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 3:09 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] L50 (Spoilers)
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> I still have stuff on MY wish list hehe.
>
> i personally like looks over stats so i wear a full set of rubicite
> (except
> for the awful helm). mithril breastplate is better chestpiece from
> solusek
> B if you want stats (ac17 15AGI). mithril bracers from sol B (ac4 wis5
> str3) or serpentine bracers from the reanimated hand in lower guk (ac1
> dex3
> agi9) are also better for stats.
>
> i am using a silvery war axe and crystalline blade as weapons. i have a
> staff or writhing in the bank. what i want is a couple short swords of
> the
> ykesha (can duel wield dmg8 del24 casts 75dmg proc), which takes anywhere
> from 8 to 12 level 45+ people to get off the ghoul lord in lower guk.
>
> the jewelry that can be made is very nice. golden amber earrings (plus 3
> STR each) golden opal amulet (9STA 6AGI) and silver ruby veil (4STR 4WIS).
> i don't feel like spending the money yet, but a platinum ruby veil is 7STR
> 7WIS. and a black pearl choker is i think 7DEX 7AGI but i like the
> stamina
> boost on the opal amulet. jagged bands from the ghost in unrest are nice
> rings, still haven't found anything better. dwarven work boots from the
> same ghost would be a stat improvement but look like chainmail.
>
> since i hate head graphics, i wear a fine silk turbin that comes off the
> Sand Giant Hatar in Oasis or North Ro. i would like the crown of the
> froglok king from lower guk though, no graphics and better stats.
>
> i still don't have a troll hide belt from upper guk but would love one or
> a
> flowing black silk sash from lower guk (still wearing a purity belt LOL).
> like i said still lots of stuff on my wish list too. for a level 50 i
> don't
> have anything real special, but i like my items and my appearance, and can
> now go after some stuff I want without worrying about experience or
> levelling, which is nice and a relief. my str, dex, and agi are all over
> 100, and i get plenty of buffs from songs or group members (clerics,
> shaman,
> etc). i've given a lot of better items that i can use to my friends, or
> to
> my paladin sister Erisi ;)
>
> so from now on i will just go after stuff i want but don't have, just have
> fun, and help others out. gimme a tell if you need anything, if i am free
> i'll come =)
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
